scripts.build:core: bun run --cwd Packages/validations build && bun run --cwd Packages/server build
scripts.build:rest: concurrently "bun run --cwd Packages/client build" "bun run --cwd Packages/swagger build" "bun run --cwd Packages/adapter build"
scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:rest
scripts.dev: concurrently "bun run --cwd Packages/server dev" "bun run --cwd Tests dev"
scripts.test:build: bun run build && bun run --cwd Tests build.js
